bgu.csp.az.api.ano
Annotation Type Algorithm

@Target(value=TYPE)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Algorithm

annotation to define the algorithm metadata

Required Element Summary
 java.lang.String value
           
 
Optional Element Summary
 ProblemType solve
           
 boolean useIdleDetector
          if this set to true the algorithm requires an idle detector
 

Element Detail

value

public abstract java.lang.String value
Returns:
the algorithm name

solve

public abstract ProblemType solve
Returns:
the type of problem this algorithm solve
Default:
bgu.csp.az.api.ProblemType.COP

useIdleDetector

public abstract boolean useIdleDetector
if this set to true the algorithm requires an idle detector

Default:
false
